bibl.title: Magic Elements in the Prayers of the Hellenistic Magic Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. Name of the examined genre of prayers in the ancient texts and in classical philology. - 2. Structural analysis. - 3. Poetical and stylistic characteristics of the genre. - 4. Genre definition on the basis of the analyses. - 5. The direct social role of the genre.
bibl.seg: Szepes E., Magic Elements in the Prayers of the Hellenistic Magic Papyri.

1. Name of the examined genre of prayers in the ancient texts and in classical philology. - 2. Structural analysis. - 3. Poetical and stylistic characteristics of the genre. - 4. Genre definition on the basis of the analyses. - 5. The direct social role of the genre.
